review:
Very satisfied with the work
Doctor Sandeep Gulati ji is very soft spoken,have lot of patience ,explains the problem and the solution very minutely,not in a hurry, .
Reference from a friend who is visiting him since many Years. Myself very much impressed by his work

Dr, Gulati is the most caring dentist I have ever seen. He is patient while explaining everything and his treatment on my front teeth (rebonding, zirconium, root canals, etc) have lasted me over a decade and counting. All my family members are happy with the services.

Gulati Clinic run by Dr. Sandeep Gulati is transparent in their dealings and charges are very reasonable and as per the estimate.

I underwent Root Canal treatment with him. It was like a walk in the park, compared to Root Canal i had undergone earlier, there was NO PAIN.

I would HIGHLY RECOMMEND  Dr. Sandeep Gulati to everyone reading this.

review: THOROUGH PROFESSIONAL AND  A GENTLEMAN. PERFECT AND PAINLESS TREATMENT . VERY PROFESSIONAL SET UP. DEFINITELY RECOMMENDED
Dr. Gulati has always been so caring and concerned and take half pain of the patient with his confidence and explanation in a calm way.  I am really his admirerüôèüôè
I would like to thanku to Dr. Gulati. ... my wife Inderpreet kaur was full satisfied  with doctor for treatment of my daughter prabhneet kaur. Thanx

********* ******.My dental surgeon for more than 20 years. He is a good human being. Explains everything in advance.You always feel that you are in good hands.You always feel at home in his clinic.He does not prescribe unnecessary treatment. GOD Bless him.

I visited Dr Gulati for teeth stains removal. He examined me and explained that I did not need a treatment at the moment. He discussed the pros and cons of the treatment   patiently and sent me back, to my pleasant surprise, without charging me anything... Such doctors are rare in a time when most doctors are bent on booking patients for unnecessary treatments and charge exorbitantly at slightest excuse... God bless you Sir...
